summary: Completed initial testing of LinkedIn Profile Roaster webapp. Critical backend API integration failure with Apify service blocking main functionality. Frontend UI works correctly but lacks proper error handling.

critical_bugs.issue: Apify LinkedIn scraper integration failing with 404 errors when fetching dataset results
critical_bugs.impact: Complete failure of main roast generation functionality
critical_bugs.details: Apify actor runs successfully (201) but dataset fetch after 15s returns 404. May need longer wait time, different dataset access method, or correct actor ID.

validation_issues.issue: Returns 500 errors for invalid inputs instead of proper 400/422 validation errors
validation_issues.impact: Poor error handling and user experience

integration_issues.issue: No error toasts shown when backend API fails, frontend gets stuck in loading state

passed_tests: Frontend UI loads with correct dark brutalist design
LinkedIn URL input field accepts input
Roast style selection buttons (savage/funny/witty/mix) all clickable
Loading states with rotating messages display correctly
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Apify LinkedIn scraper integration in /api/generate-roast endpoint. The actor runs successfully but dataset fetch fails with 404. Research correct Apify API usage, increase wait time, or verify actor ID '2SyF0bVxmgGr8IVCZ'. Also improve frontend error handling to show proper error messages when backend fails.
